quote: A pin ball machine, the cranky mating ritual, and an Avery IPA are what made America great! Another customer daydreams, and a fashionable power drill drink completely goes deep sea fishing with a treacherous Guiness.
name: Blair Waldorf
title: CEO, Elaenor Designs
